<< rot90 Elementary functions shiftdim >>

round

Round to nearest integer

Syntax

C = round(A)

Input argument

A

a variable

Output argument

C

result of round.

Description

round rounds the elements to the nearest integers.

Example

round(pi)

See also

floor, fix, ceil.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
